thread.title: Second Chinese Bank Joins Group Setting Gold Benchmark
thread.title_full: Second Chinese Bank Joins Group Setting Gold Benchmark - WSJ

author: Ese Erheriene
title: Second Chinese Bank Joins Group Setting Gold Benchmark
text:
LONDON—China Construction Bank Corp. will become the second Chinese bank to join the group of lenders setting the benchmark used to price billions of dollars’ worth of daily gold trades, in another move by the country to take a more active role in the way the world’s securities are traded.
The Beijing-based bank will become the 12th direct...
